entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
